reviewText: We had such good success with our grandchildren with Carnival of the Animals by the puppeteer that we decided to try Peer Gynt.  The adults enjoy it just fine, unfortunately our two little ones are afraid of a couple of the characters.  That is probably just our two as children vary in their likes and dislikes.  A well done production.
I bought this for my then-girlfriend and she loved it! She liked it as a child and Amazon is the only place I could find it to buy. A great movie and features Whirling Dirvishes...
